about:
BnB RUYSCHSTRAAT 28 SOUS
Jan Willem Looze has a diverse career in the Dutch video and television industry. He 
developed himself to an experienced senior AVID-editor, specialized in documentaries and music productions. At the moment Looze is focusing on producing and editing internationally relevant documentaries.

Jan Willem Looze lives with his wife Helene Hoelen and his daughters Jade (12) and Rosa (almost 10) at Ruyschstraat 28 house and 1st floor. They try to do the gardening as well as their sparse free time allows them to. 
Be aware of the fact that it only takes 10 minutes to travel by tram to all the magnificent pieces of Rembrandt in the Rijksmuseum, the Sunflowers of van Gogh in the van Gogh museum and by foot you’ll reach some historical pieces of Art in the Hermitage, at the river the Amstel.
